message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Alice, that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for $60.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $90 for the product.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle on $75? That's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $85, but that's as high as I can go.
Alice, I'm running out of time and I know you want to sell this product. I can do $78, but that's absolutely my final offer.
I understand you're running out of time, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll meet you at $82, but that's as low as I'll go.
